name: Elemental Odyssey
description:
"Adventure awaits you but... Do you have enough strength?"


Elemental Odyssey is a hard platform game where you play as an adventurer who's trying to find all the elemental gems. There will be many traps on your way, you will have to jump on walls, dodge falling blocks, and run from saws!


Portals will take you to several different lands, each of them will be unique with different dangers waiting for you!

There Are Many Different Traps To Avoid

  • Saw
  • Spike
  • Arrows
  • Spike Balls
  • And more!

Game Features

  • 4 Chapters With 35 Different Maps Each!
  • Challenge yourself!
